actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize the awarding of attorneys' fees to prevailing plaintiffs in actions brought under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the awarding of attorneys' fees to prevailing plaintiffs in actions brought under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969. States that the United States shall be liable for such fees the same as a private party.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the awarding of attorneys' fees to prevailing plaintiffs in actions brought under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969, and for other purposes.
